data.expected_result: Your status should be what you originally set.
data.short_description: Changing any of the first four settings under the "Text & Images" category in user settings shows status as offline in your user settings.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open settings. - Click on text and images. - Make changes to any of the first four options. - Come out of the sub settings to the main settings page. - Observe your status.
